original_text:
To you, O Lord, I call.
For fire has devoured
    the pastures of the wilderness,
and flame has burned
    all the trees of the field.
korean_text: 여호와여 내가 주께 부르짖으오니 불이 목장의 풀을 살랐고 불꽃이 들의 모든 나무를 살랐음이니이다

sentences.original_text: To you, O Lord, I call.
For fire has devoured the pastures of the wilderness,
and flame has burned all the trees of the field.
sentences.korean_translation: 또한 불꽃이 밭의 모든 나무를 태웠나이다.
